titles.title: Chief Herbert D. Proffitt Act of 2025
Chief Herbert D. Proffitt Act of 2025
Chief Herbert D. Proffitt Act of 2025
A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to include certain retired law enforcement officers in the public safety officers' death benefits program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Grassley without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 81.

committee.name: Senate Judiciary
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
